reviews.review: Best MARVEL movie yet. Tons of action, beautiful graphics and sound effects. Could take a page of Guardians and have a better sound track. Still a 10/10 movie in my book.

Avengers Infinity War has a powerful story in this Movie. It is funny , climatic and sad too as well. It has a lot of humor and a lot fight scenes to see. Thanos is really one of the most interesting villain in the movie because of his personality and power. The saddest part of the movie is that when Thanos snaps his fingers he disintegrated half of the universe and some of the superheroes even my favorite Marvel superhero Spider Man.

But still its a really great movie to watch
Boring, Dumb story. One fight scene after another, boring! Not even Mark Ruffalo could save this one.

Infinity War represents the culmination of the first three phrases of the MCU, and the Russo brothers manage to incorporate all the numerous characters very well, allowing adequate screen time and story lines for each major character. Infinity War is a thrilling experience that was well worth the ten year wait since the arrival of Iron Man in 2008.
Great movie all around! The only gripe I have would be the ending, but assuming how great these writers are, I'm sure the next Marvel Avengers movie will pick up perfectly where this one left off.

Not as great as the first Avengers movie but very close. I even love this movie more than the source comics because the motivation of Thanos in this movie is way better in my opinion. Just felt a little cramp with all of those characters but this movie is filled with great moments coupled with great score kept is shouting because of pure joy

Infinity War wastes no time bringing you right into the action. Unsurprisingly, Infinity War is for the fans only. This film is fast, complexly woven to incorporate all the characters, their relationships and dynamics over an overarching tale of a MEGA super-power coming to destroy the world (surprise). The biggest achievement is that they took the time to build the antagonist, which has been a low point for most of the MCU films. With perspective Infinity War means much more and provides enough thought to match the visual spectacle of battle. Yup, so pretty dang good. It's a must see for any Marvel fan.
Critics are stupid. This movie was amazing.
